alert.note: Alert for Southern Denali Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 2:20PM AKST until January 29 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility and very cold wind chills. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches by Monday Evening. North winds gusting to 45 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Very cold wind chills to 55 below. * WHERE...Southern Denali Borough. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
